description: All known RDS::DBInstances must have backup retention greater than 0
unsatPrint: All known RDS::DBInstances have backup retention different from 0
sat0print: All declared RDS::DBInstances have backup retention not zero; but there might be referenced ones that don't
sat1print: There exists at least one declared RDS::DBInstance that has backup retention set to 0

description: All declared RDS::DBInstance might have auto minor version upgrade disabled
unsatPrint: All RDS::DBInstance must have auto minor upgrade disabled
sat0print: All declared RDS::DBInstances might have auto minor upgrade disabled
sat1print: There exists at least one declared RDS::DBInstance that has auto minor version upgrade enabled

description: All known RDS::DBInstances must not have short backup retention of 1 day
unsatPrint: All RDS::DBInstances - if any - certainly do not have short backup retention
sat0print: There are RDS::DBInstances - pointed by this template - that might have short backup retention of one day
sat1print: There exists at least one RDS::DBInstance that certainly has short backup retention of one day

propQuery: dbinstance and not ((dbinstance_multiaz value false) or (dbinstance_availabilityzone some xsd:string))
description: There is some RDS::DBInstance that is replicated across multiple availability zones
unsatPrint: All RDS::DBInstances are not replicated in different Availability Zones
sat0print: There are RDS::DBInstances that might not be replicated in different Availability Zones
sat1print: There is at least one RDS::DBInstance that is replicated in different Availability Zones

description: All known RDS::DBInstance must be encrypted
sat0print: All declared RDS::DBInstances are encrypted - but there might be referenced ones that are not
sat1print: There exists at least one declared RDS::DBInstance that is not encrypted

description: linked to an open security group
unsatPrint: If there are RDS::DBinstances - they are certainly not linked to an open security group
sat0print: There are RDS::DBInstances - pointed by this template - that might be linked to an open security group
sat1print: There is at least one RDS::DBInstance
that is certainly linked to an open security group
